summary: How would you describe butterbeer without using ‘butter’ or ‘beer’? Asking for a friend.
question: How would you describe butterbeer without using ‘butter’ or ‘beer’? Asking for a friend.
answer:
If you’re a muggle born trying to tell your parents about it without mentioning the word ‘beer’ then I would have to say that’s very irresponsible lying to your parents. But if I was to say it without those two words I would say:

A frothy beverage that can be cold or warm ??

That sounds so fucking weird but y’know.

reblog.comment:
If you’re a muggle born trying to tell your parents about it without mentioning the word ‘beer’ then I would have to say that’s very irresponsible lying to your parents. But if I was to say it without those two words I would say:

That sounds so fucking weird but y’know.

tags: I'll come back and add quotes to this later on today
or feel free to reblog with your favourite Ginny quote
title: Ginny
body:
People can like and dislike whatever characters (and I can judge and block them if they hate Harry), we all have our own personal reactions etc etc. (But if you hate Harry you’re wrong. Kidding. Not really.)

So, I guess people are entitled to hate Ginny. I don’t get it, but whatever. The thing is the reasons why they hate her so often make no sense to me. Just a fangirl? No. Hasn’t got a personality? Er, you REALLY need to re-read the books, because that’s very blatantly untrue. 

She’s got a temper and acts on it on occasion, and I can see that as a valid reason for disliking her (although if that’s the case do not tell me you love Draco “that’s for my father” Malfoy). But the claim that she’s boring with no personality just doesn’t stand up at all. She’s got loads of personality and it’s as complex as you could ask for in a character who’s not centered in the story.

summary:
“What’s cooking, good looking?” 
also known as me having a cheesy as line stuck in my head for four days and channelling it into...
body:
“What’s cooking, good looking?” 

also known as me having a cheesy as line stuck in my head for four days and channelling it into writing energy

 Harry hummed to himself as he flipped the pancakes, catching them easily. He flipped them onto a plate, floating the plate to the bench beside him while he poured the second batch of pancakes out. He smiled as he felt a pair of arms wrap around his waist, nimble fingers slipping underneath his shirt.

“Hey, Malfoy.” The name was said with none of the ire and disgust that it used to hold for Harry, instead, it was filled with affection and love.

Draco hummed against Harry’s back, pressing his face into the space between Harry’s shoulder blades. “What’s cooking, good looking?”

Harry laughed, flipping the pancakes with his magic and relaxing into Draco’s arms. “That line is so corny. You need a better one. And no, anything about potions, science and chemistry is not better.”

“How come you’re so chipper in the mornings? I swear I’m still half asleep.” Draco released Harry, pinching a pancake and eating it.

Harry smiled, then replied. “Maybe because I don’t stay up past midnight reading?”

Draco pulled a face. “It’s so interesting, though! I can’t abandon the characters in the middle of some action!”

Harry shrugged, turning and gently kissing Draco on the forehead. “Good morning, little one,” he murmured as he pulled away.

“Definitely a good morning if you’re cooking pancakes. Hurry up, though, I’m starved!” Draco smiled softly, pushing himself up to sit on the bench, beside where Harry was cooking pancakes.

Harry smiled at him, expertly flipping the pancakes. He was happy here. Him and Draco, doing every domestic thing they never thought they’d live to do. He was happy.

summary: Okay, but, giving a blowjob to Harry? Like, laying on the bed or sofa, and he's above? Or a girl on her knees? I don't think...
question: Okay, but, giving a blowjob to Harry? Like, laying on the bed or sofa, and he's above? Or a girl on her knees? I don't think Harry is the kinkiest, but I think a girl on her knees, is one of Harry's kinks.
answer:
Yes please 🤤

Usually Harry’s hair is the one that’s super Medway but you’re on your knees and looking up at him so innocently and he just can’t help but pull on your hair and guide your actions. He would be a mess and just telling you how good you are and how amazing you’re doing. I don’t think he would be the kinkiest but he always lost it whenever you went on your knees, it was his favourite sight.

answer:
Oh he completely would be.

James would be Zonko’s Joke Shop

Peter would be Scrivenshaft’s Quill Shop because he actually collects quills which is cool. (Or madam puddyfoots because he likes it)

I would be the three broom sticks because everyone loves me ;)

blog.name: nikofanfic
blog.title: Harry Potter Fanfics
blog.description: Hi! Request are open and I’ll do probably any ship!

summary: That’s just the way it is.
body:
That’s just the way it is.

Lily was pacing the living room floor. Her husband was late again and she was furious. She wasn’t furious at him just the thing that kept him there.


Lily sat down on the couch with a sigh. She looked around in the little cottage in Godrics Hollow. That cottage is what they called home what they would raise a family if it ever came down to that. The clock was ticking in and she could feel her body slowly drift to sleep.


She would try to be awake when her husband came home but she would often fail.


When Lily woke up again everything was different. She wasn’t on the chouch but in her bed and beside her was a sleeping figure. She smiled gently as she saw that her husband was finally home. To her surprise was the man she loved not asleep.


“ Hey, Love “ said James Potter with that crooked smirk of his. She smiled at him gently as he was finally home.


“ You’re not hurt are you? “ Lily asked with concern in her voice. She knew that he was quite reckless on the battlefields.


“ No wounds nor bruises “ he said with a chuckle as he felt his wife move closer to him.


“ Why so clingy, Evans? “ James said with a smile when he used her maiden name.


“ That’s just the way it is “ Lily said with a smile before falling asleep again.

blog.name: whiffingbooks
blog.title: Is there no way out of the mind?

summary: Harry Potter is my favorite character but not for the reasons people usually thinks he is. I don’t like him just because of his...
body:
Harry Potter is my favorite character but not for the reasons people usually thinks he is.

I don’t like him just because of his sarcastic remarks or sass or bravery. I don’t also like him just for his deeds.

In fact one of the reasons I love Harry Potter is because he is a fine example of a person capable of being good even when everything could have turned him into the greatest villain.

Harry is emotionally, mentally and physically abused by his relatives and still he has the ability to forgive and show compassion. He is raised as a sacrifice by someone he considers his mentor and still he forgives the betrayal. He forgives the most hated teacher after he sees his memories even though he was bullied and tormented continuously. He accepts his father’s shortcomings and extends help to his most hated rival. He defends his parents’ betrayer in spite of his continued treachery. And last but not the least (in fact it is the greatest) he is willing to spare the most vile creature, the cause of all his loved ones’ deaths, if he shows remorse.

When Dumbledore said that Harry’s secret weapon is his ability to love, he was absolutely right. He has the purest soul in the entire world.

Harry Potter is not only an inspiration, he is an aspiration.

He forgives the most hated teacher after he sees his memories even though he was bullied and tormented continuously. He accepts his father’s shortcomings and extends help to his most hated rival. He defends his parents’ betrayer in spite of his continued treachery. And last but not the least (in fact it is the greatest) he is willing to spare the most vile creature, the cause of all his loved ones’ deaths, if he shows remorse.

When Dumbledore said that Harry’s secret weapon is his ability to love, he was absolutely right. He has the purest soul in the entire world.

Harry Potter is not only an inspiration, he is an aspiration.
trail.content:
Harry Potter is my favorite character but not for the reasons people usually thinks he is.

I don’t like him just because of his sarcastic remarks or sass or bravery. I don’t also like him just for his deeds.

In fact one of the reasons I love Harry Potter is because he is a fine example of a person capable of being good even when everything could have turned him into the greatest villain.

Harry is emotionally, mentally and physically abused by his relatives and still he has the ability to forgive and show compassion. He is raised as a sacrifice by someone he considers his mentor and still he forgives the betrayal. He forgives the most hated teacher after he sees his memories even though he was bullied and tormented continuously. He accepts his father’s shortcomings and extends help to his most hated rival. He defends his parents’ betrayer in spite of his continued treachery. And last but not the least (in fact it is the greatest) he is willing to spare the most vile creature, the cause of all his loved ones’ deaths, if he shows remorse.

When Dumbledore said that Harry’s secret weapon is his ability to love, he was absolutely right. He has the purest soul in the entire world.

Harry Potter is not only an inspiration, he is an aspiration.

summary:
Against all odds, I've reached 1500 followers; thank you all so so much!!!! ❤️❤️❤️
To celebrate, I'll be doing...WRITING...
body:
Against all odds, I’ve reached 1500 followers; thank you all so so much!!!! ❤️❤️❤️

To celebrate, I’ll be doing…WRITING PROMPTS!!!! Send me a character/ship and a phrase/word/request, and I’ll write a drabble or a poem about them, whichever you want! Fun part: you can request whether you want it to be in first or third person pov! I’ll also be doing multiple fandoms, so if you want something non-tolkien, be sure to check the tags.

I will not accept any nsfw or incest prompts, so please stay clear of that

Things you have to do to participate:

  • Follow this blog
  • Like or reblog this post
  • Visit my inbox!!

tags: harry potter and the half blood prince
summary: I have been looking for someone who agreed on this, someone who was as angry about it as I was, I've been looking for this...
body:
I have been looking for someone who agreed on this, someone who was as angry about it as I was, I’ve been looking for this position since I was fucking 12 years old thank you very much @shakspaere.

I have been so annoyed and mad at Ginny for this for years and have always been looking for someone to agree with me on it. Ginny was petty and bitchy and incredible rude towards Hermione and no one paid attention to it and I did and it made me stressed af. Hermione deserved an apology that petty Ginevra Weasley never gave her.

Thanks for coming to my ted talk.

summary:
Draco: There was such a whiny man at the doctor's today!
Harry: What was he complaining about? About a tiny leaf on his hair?...
body:
Draco: There was such a whiny man at the doctor's today!
Harry: What was he complaining about? About a tiny leaf on his hair? Because, and I quote you, "it's fine to whine about that, that bitch shouldn't be on my hair!"
Draco: Nevermind

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: There was such a whiny man at the doctor's today!

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: What was he complaining about? About a tiny leaf on his hair? Because, and I quote you, "it's fine to whine about that, that bitch shouldn't be on my hair!"

summary: This person has put a link to their video on a bunch of Remus’ and mine posts and I keep deleting them because Remus and I don’t...
body:
This person has put a link to their video on a bunch of Remus’ and mine posts and I keep deleting them because Remus and I don’t like them.

We aren’t going to give you shoutouts if you do it like this. Ask nicely and we might. But don’t do it like this.
